titles.title: Aircraft Fire Prevention Act of 1987
A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to require smoke detection devices in bathrooms on aircraft operated in air commerce.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Hearings Held by Subcommittee on Aviation Prior to Referral (Oct 7, 87).

bill.summary: 9/29/1987--Introduced. Aircraft Fire Prevention Act of 1987 - Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to require a smoke detection device in each bathroom on a civil aircraft operated in air commerce.
